name: 31huiyi
overview:
1Event was founded in 2010 and headquartered in Shanghai, China’s international finance center. It focuses on events industry, like conferences, exhibitions, trade shows, events and business meetings. By the innovative internet and mobile technology, 31huiyi.com is dedicated to improve events’ quality and efficiency. It is one of the most advanced business events portal in China and the first interactive web platform combining the organizers, visitors and suppliers.

31huiyi.com provides organizers with the professional and convenient web platform of one-stop network publish, promotion and interaction.

At the same time, 31huiyi.com provides user with easy events search, subscribe, sharing, registration, and interactive via Internet and smart phones,such as iphone , Android ,windows phone . 31huiyi.com has won great favor of users since its launch.
